Name: Weapon Familiarity(Dwarf)
Description:
Your kin have instilled in you an afnity for hardhitting weapons, and you prefer them to more elegant arms. You
are trained with the battleaxe, pick, and warhammer.
In addition, you gain access to all uncommon dwarf weapons.
For the purpose of profciencies, you treat martial dwarf weapons
as simple weapons and exotic dwarf weapons as martial weapons.
More about weapons can be found on page 178.
